welcome_message_body: Welcome to Elyria, a charming city in the heart of the United States known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful visit!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hopkins International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Hopkins International Airport serves domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Hopkins International Airport serves domestic flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
